name: World Of Tea: REMASTERED
description:
The long awaited remaster of a year old Bitsy game. Now fully in RPG Maker MV! You are trying to become the TEA Master. Tea master is known to behold great power with the help of tea. Find the TEA and become the TEA-Master.

Includes:

  • Deeper story
  • Different Endings
  • Choices
  • More dialog
  • A proper final boss fight
  • music (also mutable in the options menu, if you think its out of place)

Credits:

  • A game made by Nikita
  • With help of Yanfly plugins & RPG Maker MV

Music Used:

  • We Are One by Vexento https://www.youtube.com/user/Vexento
    https://soundcloud.com/vexento Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/Ssvu2yncgWU
  • ► Music by: Jesse Warren (Spektrem)
  • Track Name: "Miles Above You" 
  • Follow Spektrem on SoundCloud HERE - https://soundcloud.com/jesse_warren 
  • Follow Spektrem on Facebook HERE - https://www.facebook.com/jessewarrenmd
  • Follow Spektrem on Twitter HERE - https://twitter.com/jessewarren
